thread.section_title: Templatemonster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Templatemonster | www.templatemonster.com | 6 of 62
thread.title: lisa m

author: lisa m
title: lisa m
text: We just love the service and help with 24-7 chat with template monster.. but this review has to be for Alain, he took on board what our complications were and instead of just submitting tickets - he listened and was patient and polite. The websites we have created such lovelunesdale and littlewalkerskl with fantastic templates - have got us great reviews and quick repeat orders. Hence the urgency in our request for help on the next 6 websites we need to build! Thank you Alain! :-)
